verses.verse: Behold, <S%H935><s%> there came a man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> out of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to Beth El: <S%H1008><s%> and Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> was standing <S%H5975><s%> by the altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn incense. <S%H6999><s%>

He cried <S%H7121><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Altar, <S%H4196><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> <S%H1121><s%> 'Behold, a son shall be born <S%H3205><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> Josiah <S%H2977><s%> by name. <S%H8034><s%> On you he shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> who burn incense <S%H6999><s%> on you, <S%H8313><s%> and they will burn men <S%H120><s%>'s bones on you. <S%H6106><s%>'"

He gave <S%H5414><s%> a sign <S%H4159><s%> the same day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This is the sign <S%H4159><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken: <S%H1696><s%> Behold, <S%H4196><s%> the altar will be split <S%H7167><s%> apart, <S%H1880><s%> and the ashes that are on it will be poured out. <S%H8210><s%>"

It happened, <S%H4428><s%> when the king heard <S%H8085><s%> the saying <S%H1697><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> which he cried <S%H7121><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> that Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> put out <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from the altar, <S%H4196><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Seize <S%H8610><s%> him! <S%H3027><s%>" His hand, which he put out <S%H7971><s%> against him, <S%H3001><s%> dried up, so that he could <S%H3201><s%> not draw it back again to himself. <S%H7725><s%>

The altar <S%H4196><s%> also was split <S%H7167><s%> apart, <S%H1880><s%> and the ashes poured out <S%H8210><s%> from the altar, <S%H4196><s%> according to the sign <S%H4159><s%> which the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the <S%H559><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> "Now entreat <S%H2470><s%> the favor <S%H6440><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and pray <S%H2470><s%> for me, <S%H3027><s%> that my hand may be restored me again. <S%H7725><s%>" The man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> entreated <S%H2470><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> was restored him again, <S%H7725><s%> and became as it was before. <S%H7223><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> "Come <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> with me, <S%H5582><s%> and refresh yourself, <S%H5414><s%> and I will give you a reward. <S%H4991><s%>"

The man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the king, <S%H4428><s%> "Even if you gave <S%H5414><s%> me half <S%H2677><s%> of your house, <S%H1004><s%> I would not go in <S%H935><s%> with you, <S%H398><s%> neither would I eat bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in this place; <S%H4725><s%>

for so was it commanded <S%H6680><s%> me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall eat no bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> neither return <S%H7725><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that you came. <S%H1980><s%>'"
So he went <S%H3212><s%> another <S%H312><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and didn't <S%H7725><s%> return by the way <S%H1870><s%> that he came <S%H935><s%> to Bethel. <S%H1008><s%>

Now there lived <S%H3427><s%> an <S%H259><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> in Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and one of his sons <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> him all the works <S%H4639><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> in Bethel. <S%H1008><s%> They also told <S%H1696><s%> their father <S%H4428><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> which he had spoken <S%H5608><s%> to the king. <S%H1><s%>

Their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to them, <S%H1870><s%> "Which way did he go? <S%H1980><s%>" Now his sons <S%H1121><s%> had seen <S%H7200><s%> which <S%H335><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> went, <S%H1980><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> from Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> "Saddle <S%H2280><s%> the donkey <S%H2543><s%> for me. <S%H2280><s%>" So they saddled the donkey <S%H2543><s%> for him; <S%H7392><s%> and he rode on it.

He went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> him sitting <S%H3427><s%> under an oak. <S%H424><s%> He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H376><s%> "Are you the man of God <S%H430><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> from Judah? <S%H3063><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "I am."
Then he said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3212><s%> "Come home <S%H1004><s%> with me, <S%H398><s%> and eat bread. <S%H3899><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "I may <S%H3201><s%> not return <S%H7725><s%> with you, <S%H935><s%> nor go in with you; <S%H398><s%> neither will I eat bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> with you in this place. <S%H4725><s%>

For it was said <S%H1697><s%> to me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall eat no bread <S%H3899><s%> nor drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> there, <S%H7725><s%> nor turn again to go <S%H3212><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that you came. <S%H1980><s%>'"

He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5030><s%> "I also am a prophet as you are; <S%H4397><s%> and an angel spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Bring him back with you into your house, <S%H1004><s%> that he may eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>'" He lied to him. <S%H3584><s%>
So he went back <S%H7725><s%> with him, <S%H398><s%> and ate bread <S%H3899><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and drank <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>
It happened, <S%H3427><s%> as they sat at the table, <S%H7979><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to the prophet <S%H5030><s%> who brought him back; <S%H7725><s%>

and he cried <S%H7121><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> from Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> <S%H3282><s%> 'Because you have been disobedient <S%H4784><s%> to the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and have not kept <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded you, <S%H6680><s%>

but came back, <S%H7725><s%> and have eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drunk <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> of which he said <S%H1696><s%> to you, <S%H398><s%> "Eat no bread, <S%H3899><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> no water; <S%H4325><s%>" your body <S%H5038><s%> shall not come <S%H935><s%> to the tomb <S%H6913><s%> of your fathers. <S%H1><s%>'"

It happened, <S%H310><s%> after he had eaten <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> he had drunk, <S%H8354><s%> that he saddled <S%H2280><s%> the donkey <S%H2543><s%> for the prophet <S%H5030><s%> whom he had brought back. <S%H7725><s%>

When he had gone, <S%H3212><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> met <S%H4672><s%> him by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and killed <S%H4191><s%> him. <S%H5038><s%> His body was cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the donkey <S%H2543><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> it. <S%H738><s%> The lion also stood <S%H5975><s%> by the body. <S%H5038><s%>

Behold, <S%H582><s%> men passed by, <S%H5674><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the body <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the body; <S%H5038><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> it in the city <S%H5892><s%> where the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> lived. <S%H3427><s%>

When the prophet <S%H5030><s%> who brought him back <S%H7725><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it, <S%H559><s%> he said, "It is the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> who was disobedient <S%H4784><s%> to the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Therefore Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> him to the lion, <S%H738><s%> which has mauled <S%H7665><s%> him and slain <S%H4191><s%> him, <S%H1697><s%> according to the word of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which he spoke to him. <S%H1696><s%>"
He spoke <S%H1696><s%> to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Saddle <S%H2280><s%> the donkey <S%H2543><s%> for me. <S%H2280><s%>" They saddled it.

He went <S%H3212><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> his body <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the donkey <S%H2543><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the body. <S%H5038><s%> The lion <S%H738><s%> had not eaten <S%H398><s%> the body, <S%H5038><s%> nor mauled <S%H7665><s%> the donkey. <S%H2543><s%>

The prophet <S%H5030><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> the body <S%H5038><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and laid <S%H3240><s%> it on the donkey, <S%H2543><s%> and brought it back. <S%H7725><s%> He came <S%H935><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> of the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> to mourn, <S%H5594><s%> and to bury him. <S%H6912><s%>
He laid <S%H3240><s%> his body <S%H5038><s%> in his own grave; <S%H6913><s%> and they mourned <S%H5594><s%> over him, <S%H1945><s%> saying, "Alas, my brother! <S%H251><s%>"

It happened, <S%H310><s%> after he had buried <S%H6912><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> that he spoke to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "When I am dead, <S%H4191><s%> then bury <S%H6912><s%> me in the tomb <S%H6913><s%> in which the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is buried. <S%H6912><s%> Lay <S%H3240><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> his bones. <S%H6106><s%>

For the saying <S%H1697><s%> which he cried <S%H7121><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and against all the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> which are in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> will surely happen."

After <S%H310><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> didn't <S%H7725><s%> return from his evil <S%H7451><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> but again <S%H7725><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> from among all <S%H7098><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%> Whoever wanted <S%H2655><s%> to, <S%H4390><s%> he consecrated him, <S%H3548><s%> that there might be priests of the high places. <S%H1116><s%>

This thing <S%H1697><s%> became sin <S%H2403><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeroboam, <S%H3379><s%> even to cut it off, <S%H3582><s%> and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> it from off the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
